channel.title: 1 Connection Per IP?
channel.description: I saw somebody post that there is a way to only let 1 connection per IP on a server. Does anyone know how to do this for sure? If so, please let me know, and maybe we could TV each other. Or you could just leave directions on here. Thanks.

item.title: 1 Connection Per IP?

item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Look in your Config.Class
